title: Portugal Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Portugal decreased to 254.50 percent in 2021 from 260.10 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Portugal averaged 250.17 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 322.70 percent in 2012 and a record low of 159.90 percent in 1995. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
